item.title: List and revoke your active Console sessions
item.description: There is now a dedicated page to list web sessions in the Clever Cloud Console. It shows all the sessions currently active across your devices and browsers with creation/expiration date, last activity. You can revoke any sessions, except the current one (disconnect from the Console to revoke it).
